messages.message: <!here> I took latest code  from master  a day ago! on trying to open a .ibdoc file , it opens as in the screenshot. can anyone help me with this new view?
Instead of running `make build-local` in webpacked, can you try `yarn bundle-local:beta`?
and you might have to restart other services as well.

your static content does not seem to be loaded (you can verify that by inspecting your browser console).

--> i think you need to rebuild nginx (and maybe webapp)

@Mohit Tried running `make build-docker run-docker-proxy`
and it seems this command fails at this point
However , looking at the MakeFile, running `make run-docker-proxy` helps routing locally! @Mohit I am curious to know why the command in the above fails!
@Pranjal Rai I tried what u suggested, but the issue remains the same!:neutral_face:

as per this (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/e4142a75067b15f145230f76ebe3ed0a7de7c19a/webserver/server-nginx/Makefile#L175), your webapp should be running before you start nginx. is your webapp running?
yes, it is running ,listening to 5000, and `make run-docker-proxy`   is running fine, but on trying to run `make build-docker run-docker-proxy` it fails with the above error in terminal
this means your build is not passing. since run-docker-proxy is working, can you run nginx and see if it resolves your original issue?
nginx is running, however, the issue remains the same! Tried inspecting and looking at sources, the static folder contains some fonts, css out etc when trying to view ibdoc file
Is this solved? @will might be able to help with nginx related issues
